Just after the 2019, the slow and sad degradation of Portal 2 has started. It was a genius game I always loved to get back and play some community maps in. Being a MacOSX player makes it worse for the game support, therefore several bugs (mainly in multiplayer) have been appearing before the Mojave system update. After this, I wasn't able to play this game since it was only 32 bit. Because of that I created an NVidia GeForce now Acc, but after several tries I found it impossible to play... The game crashes after 3 minutes of lags and problematic gameplay.. What a pity! I would understand that it doesn't work on the MacOS, but at least the Windows version should be playable and without major bugs. I know, that there are only few developers working on this game, if there are any, but I would be really grateful, if the playability of the game and mainly the still used community maps would be improved and fixed. Please.
I love it so much, I can play it over and over and over again without feeling bored and still feel so sad in the end of it. Incredible writing and music. Masterpiece

one of the best game ever played

Amazing game! Graphics still hold up to this day, the story is amazing, the puzzles are the right level of difficult and can really make you feel like an idiot and the comedy is superb. Also, the co op mode is really good for playing with a friend as well as many community made chambers. 

GET THIS GAME!
